text: Lockdown has provided the chance to meet virtually colleagues from around the world doing my job #Hydrometry. 🇮🇸 🇳🇴 🇨🇦 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 🇫🇮 🇬🇱 🇮🇪 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 🇸🇪 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 🇺🇸 🇫🇷 Thanks to the organisers @Nick_Everard et al., #NordicHydrometryWorkshop Nice to present what we have been doing @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/OX6uGY5aA5

@EnvAgency On #CleanAirDay can anyone stop the Environment Agency from harming our planet?? EA @EnvAgency just approved Europe's biggest incinerator for rural Essex, UK. Belching out 625,000 tns CO2 pa. Giving greedy company financial incentive to BURN waste rather than recycle. #help
